mapper.select: select * from storeinfo where userid=#{userid} and newsid=#{newsid} and isdel=0
mapper.update: update storeinfo set isdel = 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select a.id,a.type,a.title,b.companyname,a.createtime from storeinfo d left join news a on d.newsid=a.id left join company b on a.companyid=b.id left join user c on a.userid=c.id where a.isdel=0 and d.userid=#{userid} order by a.createtime desc
